name: Unfair Souls: Darkest Grind 2D
description:
VERY HARD 2D PLATFORMER GAME
As simple as this 2D platformer game may seem, that much more difficult can it become. A few seconds into this hard game and you will encounter invisible traps & fake platforms. Memorizing the fatal spots is a key to succeed in your adventure!



SIMPLE 2D PIXEL ART GAME
Enjoy a super simple game where you have simple movement controls and enjoy challenging 2D platformer experience when it comes to perfect precision jumping from platform to platform.



SOULS LIKE INSPIRED ARTSTYLE
With art-style inspired from our industry favorite RPG games like Dark Souls, Castlevania & Blasphemous but in a 2D pixel art platformer experience, where you can play on the GO, a great time-killer!



OFFLINE BIG GAME
Enjoy Unfair Souls: Darkest Grind 2D even offline, low MB size but with many hours of gameplay!



INSANE 2D PIXEL ART GRAPHICS
Beautiful pixel art with beautiful 2D lighting, an experience like console 2D platformer games.



DARK DUNGEONS & CASTLES
Like in many medieval games, you will go through prisons, to darkest dungeons and from mountains to castles, you will face unfair obstacles and jumping gaps, but like every Knight, you will find a to your journey's completion!



NO ADS - NO PAY TO WIN
This 2D pixel art experience can be played offline. Everything in the game can be unlocked by playing and only playing. No ads to disrupt your gameplay!



HOW IT BEGINS
A strange violent disease spreads across the world. The King's order is to fill the outside areas of the castle with deadly traps. No one should get close. He protects something very precious and important for him.. but what is it? Reach the Farland Castle to find out!



FROM THE CREATORS OF ELDEN SHELL: MORTAL RING
Enjoy this 2D platformer hard game from the creators of Elden Shell: Mortal Ring & Run Souls, a very small indie game studio.
